column1: Write a C function that takes two integers as input and returns their sum.
Write a C function that takes a string as input and returns the length of the string.
Write a C function that takes an array of integers as input and returns the sum of all the even numbers in the array.
Write a C function that takes a string as input and returns the reverse of that string.
Write a C function that takes an array of strings as input and returns the length of the longest string in the array.
